suppress.notes: Kotlin script is not used in the Sudo Site Reputation SDK. We can re-evaluate and possible move to Kotlin 1.4.0.
vulnerability is A comparison error in OpenBSDBCrypt.checkPassword(). checkPassword is not used.
False positive. Vulnerability relates to tmp files created via Guava which is not done.
False positive. All issues relate to remote logging via log4j via Dokka dependencies which is not exercised.

vulnerability is in a Java API used for temporary file and folder creation. This library does not create temporary files or folders. This may be a false positive given the CVE documentation says it was fixed in kotlin V1.4.21 and we are using kotlin V1.4.32
